item.title: Portal help update
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

Okay so I fixed my command so it changes your height but when I click on it, it makes me go up instead of down. Here is the code I used case 881: if (actionTimer == 0) { teleportToX = 3557; teleportToY = 3297; heightLevel -= -1; actionTimer = 2; sendMessage("You climb down the hole into Verac's Tomb"); } break;

Read full topic
